dialogueSection.text: Det Carter: Sully, you got here just in time.
Sully: What do we have here?
Det Carter: Well, the victim was Mrs Roberts, a local librarian.
Det Carter: There are no signs of forced entry so she may have let her attacker in.
Det Carter: Looks like she got stabbed whilst she was talking to someone.

option.text: Sully: I guess she got... ...Cut off.
option.reply: Det Carter: Not the puns again...

option.text: Sully: Good detective work Carter, looks likes you're... ...Dead on.
option.reply: Det Carter: Not the puns again...

option.text: Sully: A librarian eh? Looks like she finally... ...Checked out.
option.reply: Det Carter: Not the puns again...

dialogueSection.text: Sully: Alright, let's check the place for evidence.
Det Carter: You got it Sully!
Sully: I think I've found something.
Sully: ...look, there is a strange symbol on the paper.
Det Carter: Hold up. I think i've seen that symbol before.
Det Carter: There was a rumour going round town that a guy down at Jones' bar knew something about this symbol.
Det Carter: We should get down there and find Jack the Fink, he might know something.
